body.content: This little lib was inspired by some client work I did. The twitter SDK was a little chonky and we only really needed this one feature. A simple React-Native component that consumes a tweet id and renders an embedded tweet. I added some native modules for data fetching just for fun ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰.

A useless (but fun) lib that can read and parse png files into their respective 'chunks'. If you ever find yourself needing to hide a secret message in a png file (a fairly common occurence, right?), this lib is for you.
A chip8 emulator that can run local and remote games in normal and developer mode. Want to play 'snake' on your laptop? This lib has got you covered.
The site you are currently scrolling. Some might say, 'Why build such a simple site with Next.js?'. To which I would reply, 'BIG blog plans so piss off.'
